title: Budget proposals to play catalyst role for growth of the Indian solar sector: Industry players
description: Energy sector players praise Union Budget for FY25, citing it as a catalyst for Indian solar industry growth. Key announcements include tax cuts on critical minerals, support for pumped storage projects, and policy clarity for energy transition. Education sector also sees significant funding allocation for quality improvement and skill development.
